name: Houm
headline: All-in-one real estate marketplace for Latin America
description: Houm is an all-in-one real estate marketplace that helps landlords find tenants, collect rent, and manage their properties in Latam.

founders.name: Benjam√≠n Labra, Founder
founders.description:
Real Estate fanatic with a background in investment banking and real estate development, asset management, and finance. 
Studied business in Chile and then did my Master of Science in Real Estate Development in Columbia University. 
Passionate about technology, Proptech, and Real Estate

founders.name: Nicolas Knockaert, Founder
founders.description:
Industrial Engineer with a M. Sc. in Real Estate at Columbia University.  
12+ years of experience in real estate development, investments and proptech. 
Passionate about evolving the real estate industry through technology and granting easier and safer access to a home to everyone in the world.

## Nuestra historia
2018
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27296%27%20height=%27160%27/%3e)![Fundadores de Houm en ciudad empresarial](https://houm.com)
**Nace Houm** fundado por Benjam√≠n Labra (CEO) y Nicol√°s Knockaert (COO) para ayudar a millones de personas a encontrar su hogar so√±ado o a vender o rentar su inmueble.
2019
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27296%27%20height=%27160%27/%3e)![Computador mostrando el homepage de houm](https://houm.com)
**Lanzamos nuestro marketplace** para publicar, rentar y comprar inmuebles. Logramos nuestro primer levantamiento de capital, Serie Pre Seed.
2020
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27296%27%20height=%27160%27/%3e)![Equipo de Houm iniciando operaci√≥n en Colombia](https://houm.com)
**Llegamos a Colombia y fuimos seleccionados a la mayor aceleradora del mundo: YC** Iniciamos operaci√≥n en Bogot√° y en Diciembre y fuimos seleccionados en Y Combinator.
2021
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27296%27%20height=%27160%27/%3e)![Equipo de Houm iniciando operaci√≥n en M√©xico](https://houm.com)
**Abrimos M√©xico** En enero iniciamos nuestra operaci√≥n en CDMX. Este a√±o logramos levantar una Serie A de USD 35 MM.
2022
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27296%27%20height=%27160%27/%3e)![Equipo de Houm celebrando el crecimiento](https://houm.com)
**Seguimos creciendo para ayudar a miles de familias a encontrar su hogar so√±ado.** Renta, Vende, Compra e Invierte con Houm.

generated_description:
### Overview of Houm

![Houm Logo](https://houm.com/static/brandImage/logo.svg)

**Name**: Houm  
**Founded**: 2018  
**Location**: Santiago, Chile  
**Employees**: Approximately 400  
**Funding**: USD 45 million in investment rounds, including a Series A of USD 35 million  
**Group Partner**: Aaron Epstein  
**Incubator**: Y Combinator (Batch W21)  
**Website**: [houm.com](https://houm.com)

---

### Mission

Houm aims to create an **all-in-one real estate marketplace for Latin America**. It simplifies the rental and management process for landlords and helps tenants find their dream homes.

### What They Do

Houm started as a platform for landlords to find tenants, collect rent, and manage properties, and it has grown to include tools for buyers. They operate in three countries: **Chile, Mexico, and Colombia**, across more than eight cities. Homes are showcased every eight minutes, highlighting their active presence in the market.

### Growth Timeline

- **2018**: Houm was founded by **Benjam√≠n Labra (CEO)** and **Nicol√°s Knockaert (COO)**, aiming to help people find homes to rent or buy.
- **2019**: Launched their marketplace for publishing, renting, and buying properties, securing their first Pre Seed funding.
- **2020**: Expanded to Colombia and gained selection into Y Combinator.
- **2021**: Expanded into Mexico and raised a Series A funding round.
- **2022**: Continued to grow, focusing on helping families find their ideal homes.

### Presence

Houm is active in:
- **Chile**: Santiago, Valpara√≠so, Concepci√≥n
- **Mexico**: Mexico City, Guadalajara
- **Colombia**: Bogot√°, Medell√≠n

### Final Thoughts

In the rapidly evolving real estate landscape of Latin America, Houm stands out for its commitment to simplifying property management and rental processes. With a robust team and significant backing, they are well-positioned to continue making strides in proptech in the region. If you‚Äôre in the market for a new home or looking to list a property, Houm just might have what you need!
